title: R
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''r''' is the command to read a [[scroll]].
*Pressing '''R''' is the command to remove [[jewellery]].

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''r''' represents a [[rat]]-type monster.
*'''R''' represents mythological creatures such as [[efreet]]s and [[rakshasa]]s.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.22]], this was the command to read a spellbook.
*Prior to [[0.13]], you had to activate [[manual]]s by reading them.
